name: Olaf the Boozer
storyline:
Ever woke up after a legendary night out with absolutely no memory of what happened? Well, meet Olaf - a dwarf who's taking "booze-induced blackout" to a whole new level.

In this pixel art detective comedy, you'll help our hungover hero piece together the events of last night while fixing the mess he left behind. Something important is missing, the tavern looks like it hosted a troll wrestling championship, there's a haunted lumber mill, and why does that chicken keep following you around?
summary: Help a hungover dwarf piece together his wild night out! Olaf the Boozer is basically fantasy The Hangover as a sokoban game. You investigate the consequences of your epic pub crawl, fixing what can be fixed and making amends along the way. There’s a bit of mystery, one very angry chicken, and a nice time-bending twist on classic gameplay that keeps Olaf fresh.
